name: Sand River EP (CD) [2010]
description:
The CD version of the Sand River EP, including artwork designed by the band and a self-designed disc that comes in 5 different colours (you never know what you might get...)

Tracklist:

1. The Reprisal (Kid Dust pt. 3)
2. Love
3. Kid Dust and the Black Heart (pts. 1 & 2)
4. My Heart is an Open Book
5. Goodnight, Goodnight
6. A Letter (to the Lovers of Emma)
